it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    It represents the player and performs the aviable actions an methods that modify his state
    Author:
    Cysko7927

      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon(WeaponCard weapon)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                      java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Add a weapon card in player's deck if player has minus of 3 weapons
        Parameters:
        weapon - weapon that the player grabs from game board
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if weapon is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if player has 3 weapons

      • changeWeapon

        public WeaponCard changeWeapon(WeaponCard newWeapon,
                               java.lang.String oldWeapon)
                        throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Exchange a old weapon with a new from game board and it returns the old too (requires) the old weapon must be in list of weapon card
        Parameters:
        newWeapon - new weapon card to add in player's deck
        oldWeapon - name of the weapon in player's deck to exchange with the new too
        Returns:
        the old weapon that was in player's deck
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if newWeapon or oldWeapon are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if old weapon is not in the hands of the player

      • addPowerUp

        public void addPowerUp(PowerUpCard powerupCard)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Add a power up card in player's deck if the player hasn't already 3 power up
        Parameters:
        powerupCard - power up card to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if powerupCard is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if player has already three power up cards

        Returns:
        card power up that has been used
        Throws:

                    java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • calculateScoreForEachPlayer

        public java.util.Map<ColorId,java.lang.Integer> calculateScoreForEachPlayer()
                                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        if damage of this player is 11 or 12 returns a hash map with key color of player and value the score that he obtained doing damage to this player and it frees player's board It consider also the first blood but not the mark of revenge and the double kills Else it launch exceptions if No Possible calculate Score Requires : the number of player must be max 5 like written in the instruction set
        Returns:
        Score
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the getNumberOfDamagePoint isn't 11 or 12

        It returns all the players that this player can see also trough a door in other rooms In the list there is also the player that can see the others
        Parameters:
        board - Game board where there is the Room list of the arena
        Returns:
        Players that He can see
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if board is null
